tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE real_estate_projects (
    project_id INT NOT NULL,
    project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    project_description TEXT,
    blockchain_address VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    goal_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    current_funding DECIMAL(10, 2) DEFAULT 0,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    PRIMARY KEY (project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Campaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE NOT NULL,
    funding_goal DECIMAL(12, 2) NOT NULL,
    current_funds DECIMAL(12, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Backers (
    backer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT REFERENCES Campaigns(campaign_id),
    backer_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    contribution DECIMAL(12, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Campaigns (
	campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	project_name VARCHAR(255),
	start_date DATE,
	end_date DATE,
	target_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
	transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	backer_id INT,
	campaign_id INT,
	amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
	transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
	FOREIGN KEY (backer_id) REFERENCES Backers(backer_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (campaign_id) REFERENCES Campaigns(campaign_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Campaigns (
    campaign_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    project_description TEXT,
    funding_goal DECIMAL(12, 2),
    start_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    end_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Investments (
    investment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id UUID REFERENCES Campaigns(campaign_id),
    investor_id UUID REFERENCES Investors(investor_id),
    amount DECIMAL(12, 2) NOT NULL,
    investment_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
